citations.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
“I suppose if a man has something once, always something of it remains.”
The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
Physicists are made of atoms. A physicist is an attempt by an atom to understand itself.
citations.reference: Parallel Worlds: A Journey Through Creation, Higher Dimensions, and the Future of the Cosmos

citations.quote: An expanding universe does not preclude a creator, but it does place limits on when he might have carried out his job!
The object of the idea constituting the human mind is the body
